sumResourcesMap(Map<Resource, Integer>, Map<Resource, Integer>) - Static method in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resource
this static method sum two map of resources, example: map1={(coin,1),(servant,2)} map2={(coin,2) , (shield,1)} => sum={(coin,3), (servant,2), (shield,1)}
